application.name: Resicon
application.description: Resicon is an icon batch resizing utility application. It allows you to resize icon images into a predefined set of sizes like: 16×16, 32×32, 36×36, 48×48, 72×72 and 128×128 or use a custom one.

initialWindow.content: [This value will be overwritten by Flash Builder in the output app.xml]
initialWindow.title: Resicon
